evidence.claim: TrustHouse utilizes AWS for its cloud infrastructure and services.
The company is HIPAA compliant, ensuring the security and privacy of health data.
TrustHouse integrates with FHIR and HL7 standards for interoperability with health records.
TrustHouse employs RESTful APIs for various integrations in their platform.

icp.icp_reason: No relevant evidence found indicating X12 or clearinghouse use cases.
